item.enchantment_overhaul.rune_enchant.t: Adds one enchantment to item in enchanting table.
item.enchantment_overhaul.rune_levelup.t: Upgrades one if item's enchantments in enchanting table.
item.enchantment_overhaul.rune_remove.to: Removes one enchantment from item in enchanting table.
item.enchantment_overhaul.rune_chaos.too: Enchants item with one curse and some powerful enchantments.
Cannot be applied to already enchanted item.
